text: Jardim Helena-Vila Mara is a train station on CPTM Line 12-Sapphire, located in the district of Vila Curuçá, a few meters of the district of Jardim Helena (north side), being built to facilitate the access of passengers of both neighbourhoods, located in the city of São Paulo. ==History== The station is part of a modernization project of Line 12-Sapphire and was opened on 28 May 2008 by CPTM to attend Jardim Helena, located on East Side of São Paulo. ==References== Category:CPTM stations Category:Railway stations opened in 2008
title: Jardim Helena-Vila Mara (CPTM)
